episodes.title: THE HEADLINER: HUMAN RIGHTS ABUSE OVER RELIGIOUS CULT
episodes.description: Today we cast a spotlight to a shocking story that  unfolds last week as police dismantle an alleged religious cult. The leader, Ishmael Chokurongerwa, and seven senior members were arrested on charges of child abuse and illegal burials under their belief of a so called religious cult. Dozens of women and children were rescued from the alleged  cult's farm, where authorities discovered grave sites with secret burials, including seven children. Rufaro Deshe a  Human Rights lawyer will help us unpack legal implications of this case.
